title: Alone

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player each even night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Depending on whether the majority of alive roles are Town, Neutral, or part of any evil faction your role takes on different effects. You will know which effects are active at all times. You don't count towards Neutral majority for the purposes of your attributes.
— Town Majority:
> - Your visits are Astral.
> - Those who visit you at night will have all of their night feedback erased.
> - You secretly require one vote more than majority to be hanged.
— Evil Faction Majority:
> - You may attack even if it's an odd night.
> - Instead of attacking, you may stay home. If you do so, your defense will be upped to Unstoppable and you will attack anyone who visits you.
> - If you kill an evil faction player, you will learn the name of another random member of their faction.
— Neutral Majority:
> - You learn the identity and role of any Neutral players.
> - You gain roleblock immunity.
> - In addition to your attack, you may roleblock a player each night.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
> - Your attack tier is upped to Unstoppable.
- If the game is somehow in a state where none of these three is the majority, or the majority is tied between factions, none of these additional effects will apply.
- If, at any point, a player besides you is the only Town, Neutral, or evil faction role left alive, you will immediately and irrevocably deal an Astral Unstoppable attack to them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 3677
*There's a reason people fear loneliness in death.*
